text: confused by this message in design manager... if a module is global and can't have page specific values... then wouldn't it always use the default content... what am i missing?

What it’s attempting to say is that if you do want to change the content on _all_ your pages and emails, go to the global content editor. Your understanding is correct. Sorry about the confusion.  It’s trying to help people understand why they can’t edit that particular part of the page in the inline editor
